title: Voting Rights for UpBNB Holders too
body:
I'm a holder of all ERC-31337 tokens and have been since Root pre-sale. I strongly support the plan of of Up-Ecosystem and look forward to increasing our community. That said, now that we've branched into BSC and will likely include other chains too I think voting rights should be given to all holders of the main ERC-31337 tokens on each chain and not only the original Root holders. It's possible that there could be Root holders that don't even hold UpBNB yet they have all the voting rights on what happens to UpBNB when those that actually hold it don't.
TLDR :
I propose all original ERC-31337 (UpTokens) on each chain (ETH, BSC, Whatever is next) have equal voting rights on the ecosystem as Root holders do.
author: 0xfE13A69994743AE68053CCC7A4d601d2B63c9318
